title: garen...
body: no offense to anyone but the person at riot who designed garen and the person that gave the go ahead to release him need to be both taken out onto the street, stripped naked, whipped then shot in the head.

replies.body: Why is everyone hating on the g-man. Don't get me wrong he is kinda strong sometimes. But he has some giant weaknesses. If you fail to exploit those that's not the champion design at fault. It's yours.
People play garen?  Must be bronze ðŸ˜‚

Its ok, dont worry about it.

Garen works in certain games.
i dunno if garen needs a nerf, their is a reason why hes isnt used much

While I don't think that is the appropriate language to be using if you want to be taken seriously, and just adds a un-needed toxic vibe to the discussion.

I will say that giving a vegetable of a champion a true damage ult that executes you from half HP, regardless of tankiness, AND a spinning thing _(that somehow deals mega damage with no offensive items)_ may-or-may-not have been the best move.

and this new crit-garen phase is ever so slightly cancerous.

______

While I agree that Garen needs... something.. done to him. Im going to down-vote this because an aggressive angry approach solves nothing, and helps nobody.
